tweet.text: In preparation for the 1987 Washington Summit with Soviet leader Gorbachev, National Security Advisor Powell led a Dec. 4 National Security Planning Group meeting to hammer out final U.S. arms control positions for the summit meetings: https://t.co/0hZMQAdmdN (4/4) https://t.co/hyPH2lNZq9
